discourse_list.title: EIP-3045: Add basefee to eth getUncleByBlockHashAndIndex

content.content: github.com/ethereum/EIPs         Add basefee to eth_getUncleByBlockHashAndIndex   ethereum:master ← abdelhamidbakhta:eip-draft_uncleByBlockHashIndex_basefee            opened 07:29AM - 14 Oct 20 UTC               abdelhamidbakhta             +95 -0           EIP-1559 introduces a base fee per gas in protocol. This value is maintained under consensus as a new field in the block header structure. This change should be reflected in RPC methods that return block header information.
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of a proposal to add basefee to eth_getUncleByBlockHashAndIndex in Ethereum. The author is explaining the proposal and its purpose. A third party is giving constructive criticism of the proposal and auditing/reviewing it.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
